PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must be designed to effectively protect against dust and contaminants, ensuring its functionality and integrity.
SR Description: The PM shall comply with IEC 60529 at IP64 rating
The SPM shall comply with IEC 60529 at IP64 rating

PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must operate within the humidity range of 70% to 90% non-condensing humidity without exceeding the required non-actionable rate.
SR Description: The PM shall operate within the humidity range of 70% to 90% non-condensing humidity without exceeding the required non-actionable rate
The SPM shall operate within the humidity range of 70% to 90% non-condensing humidity without exceeding the required non-actionable rate
The TC shall operate within the humidity range of 70% to 90% non-condensing humidity without exceeding the required non-actionable rate

PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must operate within a temperature range of +5 °C to +45 °C without exceeding the required non-actionable rate.
SR Description: The PM shall operate within a temperature range of +5 °C to +45 °C without exceeding the required non-actionable rate
The SPM shall operate within a temperature range of +5 °C to +45 °C without exceeding the required non-actionable rate
The TC shall operate within a temperature range of +5 °C to +45 °C without exceeding the required non-actionable rate
